title: Endless Amenities You Deserve At Stoneridge! 3 Bedroom Available NOW!
housing_type: application fee details: Head of household $17.15 & Other adults $11.65
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'Home is a place to be proud of.', 'At Stoneridge, we thrive on making sure our residents are proud of their homes.', 'Conveniently located near the town’s best dining, shopping and entertainment hotspots, you will always find a new adventure just around the corner.', 'Stoneridge offers 2, 3 & 4 bedroom apartment homes for our residents.', 'Each floor plan includes spacious bedrooms & walk in closets, ample kitchen countertops & high energy appliances, patio or balcony, plush carpeting, and washer & dryer connections.', 'Plus – water, sewer, & trash services AND in-home wi-fi INCLUDED!', 'As far as community amenities, Stoneridge has a community clubhouse with a fully equipped kitchen, outdoor swimming pool & playground, free after-school & summer programs, & professional on-site maintenance and management!', 'Call for pricing and details on this incredible, affordable community.', 'Stoneridge is ready for you!', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- Walk-In Closet(s)', '- Outdoor Playground', '- Dishwasher', '- On-Site Laundry Facility', '- Carport Parking', '- 2, 3 & 4 Bedroom Layouts', 'We are a pet-friendly community.', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'Stoneridge participates in an affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $47,700 | 2 Occupants: $54,480 | 3', 'Occupants: $61,320 | 4 Occupants: $68,100 | 5 Occupants: $73,560 | 6', 'Occupants: $79,020.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community;\xa0credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:8:30AM-5:30PM', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Stoneridge Apartments', '16701 N. Heatherwilde Blvd.', 'Pflugerville, TX, 78660', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', '145gjCNEvf7']
